name: Griffin
character_des: This unit is from Griffin

name: Sangvis Ferris
character_des: This unit is affected by Sangvis technology and belongs to Sangvis Ferri Manufacturing

name: Paradeus
character_des: This unit's most distinctive feature is the white paint job. Everything else is a mystery. (Known to the players as the White Faction.)

name: KCCO
character_des: This unit is from the Military, caution and avoidance is advised.

name: Infected
character_des: Infected and mutated, known to players as a Zombie.

name: Statesec
character_des: This unit is from Statesec

name: BOSS
character_des: Danger! This unit is a Boss, please be careful, Commander!

name: Scarecrow
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Executioner
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Hunter
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Intruder
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Alchemist
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Destroyer
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Gager
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Architect
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Dreamer
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Ouroboros
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Judge
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Agent
character_des: S.F. Manufacturing Unit

name: Beak
character_des: Motorbike enthusiast

name: Cerberus
character_des: Cerberus, a beast-type unit developed by Sangvis Ferri, is more powerful than your regular robot dog.

name: M16A1
character_des: M16 after being infected by Parapluie

name: "Nyto"
character_des: A mysterious lifeform that calls itself "Nyto"

name: Normal
character_des: This unit has balanced stats and no outstanding traits

name: Danger
character_des: This unit is extremely dangerous, please be careful!

name: Giant
character_des: It is massive and has high health!

name: Melee
character_des: Melee attack mode

name: High speed
character_des: Has high move speed

name: Heavy
character_des: Has low move speed

name: Nimble
character_des: Has high evasion

name: Accurate
character_des: This unit has high accuracy

name: Full Auto
character_des: This unit has high rate of attack

name: Armor
character_des: This unit is armored

name: Shielded
character_des: This unit can generate a shield that blocks a fixed amount of damage

name: Precise
character_des: Attacks will only do minimal damage to this unit

name: Force field
character_des: This unit can generate a force field

name: Immunity
character_des: This unit can negate a fixed amount of damage

name: Scatter shot
character_des: This unit can attack multiple targets at once

name: Armor Penetration
character_des: Attacks can deal damage through armor

name: Weaken
character_des: Can apply debuffs to its target(s)

name: Suppression
character_des: Can apply move speed reduction to its target(s)

name: Disruption
character_des: Can apply attack speed reduction to its target(s)

name: Area damage
character_des: Can cause damage over an area.

name: Pierce
character_des: Has the ability to damage multiple units in a straight line

name: Spawner
character_des: Can produce new units during battle to join the fight

name: Minelayer
character_des: Can set traps during the mission. Units that pass by will be damaged

name: Self-Destruct
character_des: Self-destructs upon contact with its target, doing massive damage to its surroundings

name: Control
character_des: Disrupts the target and puts them out of action briefly.

name: Lock On
character_des: Locks onto an area remotely and can deal great damage to said area or target

name: Support
character_des: Can support other units in combat

name: Infiltrate
character_des: This unit will continue forward without regard for any restrictions or conditions.

name: Hacking
character_des: This unit greatly increases the cooldown of friendly Doll skills.

name: Certain Death
character_des: This unit can inflict extremely high unavoidable damage.

name: Cyborg
character_des: This unit's health is divided into multiple sections. Damaging different sections yields different results.

name: Intensify
character_des: Increases damage dealt toward the same target.

name: Anti-Individual
character_des: Prioritizes targets with fewer Dummy-Links and deals extra damage to them.

name: Morale Boost
character_des: This unit buffs other units on the battlefield.

name: Heavy Armor
character_des: This unit possesses extremely strong armor.

name: Blind
character_des: This unit significantly reduces enemies' accuracy.

name: Shielded Advance
character_des: This unit uses a shield to decrease damage taken as he moves. The amount of damage negated equals the current damage this unit can do.

name: Accelerated Assault
character_des: This unit's attack speed increases with each normal attack that hits the target. The attack speed increase will be capped after 5 normal attacks.

name: Short-Range Fumigation
character_des: Throw an incendiary grenade at the closest enemy unit.

name: Flame Jet
character_des: This unit deals AoE damage using a special flamethrower. He moves to the closest enemy unit and blasts them with a flame jet. All units behind his target also take damage.

name: Moving Smash
character_des: This unit's first attack after coming to a stop deals extra damage.

name: Fragmentation Projectile
character_des: Throw a fragmentation grenade at a random enemy unit, dealing damage to a 4-unit radius.

name: Prone Position
character_des: Stop moving and fire in the prone position after 3 seconds. When firing in this position, target the enemy unit with the lowest HP, and increase own accuracy and damage.

name: Hit Where It Hurts
character_des: Normal attacks have a chance of decreasing the target's damage and accuracy.

name: Range Increase
character_des: The attack range of this unit is increased by 3 when he comes to a stop.

name: Electric Projectile
character_des: Throw a flashbang at a random enemy unit, decreasing the target's rate of fire and moving speed.

name: Incendiary Mortar
character_des: This unit sets up an incendiary mortar at certain time intervals. The mortar's normal attacks set the targeted area on fire.

name: Electric Mortar
character_des: This unit sets up an electric mortar at certain time intervals. The mortar's normal attacks stun the targets it hits.

name: Equipment Upgrade
character_des: This unit boosts all allies' rate of fire 5 seconds after the start of the battle.

name: Sticky Bomb
character_des: Throw a sticky bomb that attaches to the closest enemy unit. The sticky bomb explodes after a period of time, dealing damage to the target and all units within a radius of 8.

name: Biotech
character_des: Regenerate the shield by an amount that is proportional to the unit's lost HP at certain intervals.

name: Incendiary Projectile
character_des: Throw an incendiary grenade at a random enemy unit.

name: Incinerator
character_des: This unit takes massive damage if his gas tank is destroyed. If his HP is lower than 30%, he receives an extra damage boost.

name: Mobile Cover
character_des: This unit fights enemies using objects for cover, which increase her evasion and accuracy. With every 30% HP lost, this unit places an extra cover to absorb damage received.

name: Hellfire
character_des: When afflicted by negative status effects, this unit immediate purges them and gains a shield.

name: Fang
character_des: This unit uses two different types of projectiles to weaken enemy units. Sticky bombs deal unavoidable damage to the nearest enemy unit while flashbangs decrease the damage and accuracy of units within the affected area.

name: Automatic Mortar
character_des: 8 seconds after the start of the battle, set up an automatic mortar every 10 seconds. All damage received by the mortar is fixed at 1.

name: Fracturing Threat
character_des: When HP is lower than 80%/50%/20%, release a Cluster Seeker Mine that deals massive damage to flagged positions.

name: Strike Focus
character_des: Increase damage by 35% and accuracy by 100% for 5 seconds. Initial cooldown: 5 seconds. Skill cooldown: 8 seconds.

name: Shoot
character_des: Attacks from this unit can be avoided by taking cover behind objects.

name: Throw
character_des: Deal massive damage to flagged positions. Avoid with caution! Ammo is left behind where projectiles land. Make use of it and counterattack!

name: Technique - Berserk
character_des: Does its base damage to distant targets, deals guaranteed damage to nearer enemy units.

name: Shielded Advance
character_des: When moving, this unit reduces damage taken by 50% with its shield.

name: Disruption B
character_des: Removes all enemy buffs and shields.

name: Disruption Y
character_des: Removes all debuffs on allies and grants them shields.

name: Specialists
character_des: A team of professionals with varying levels of experience.

name: Shields Raised
character_des: Stay in position and raise shields to gain continuous shield buff.

name: Energy Charge
character_des: Charge up a burst of energy and deal damage to targets.

name: Damage Over Time
character_des: This unit's attacks hit extremely hard and deal damage over time to enemies.

name: Throw
character_des: This unit deals enormous damage to flagged areas. Move to avoid taking damage.

name: Anti-Mechanical
character_des: This unit uses an anti-mechanical weapon that deals massive damage to enemy mechanical units.

name: Critical
character_des: As the leader of the enemy echelon, killing this unit will reduce the damage and evasion of other enemy units.

name: Command
character_des: This unit buffs other units on the battlefield.

name: Summoner
character_des: This unit keeps summoning new units onto the battlefield.

name: Stealer
character_des: This unit takes some of their enemies' stats and adds them to their own.

name: Assassin Mode
character_des: This unit uses blades and claws to slash down enemy units with no Dummies.

name: Raise Shield
character_des: Reduce damage taken by units behind self. Raise Shield status automatically ends after taking a certain amount of damage while Raise Shield is active.

name: Commandeer
character_des: Steal the accuracy of the current attack target and mark them; the marks stack. Normal attacks deal extra damage to targets depending on the number of marks they have.

name: Cover Order
character_des: Raise all friendly units' evasion.

name: Stalwart
character_des: Reduce damage taken by all friendly units around self as well as the damage of enemy units while on the field.

name: Sakura Inverse
character_des: Gain a shield that lasts 5 seconds. If the shield breaks during its duration, raise self evasion. Otherwise, raise self firepower.

name: Pizza Mark
character_des: Attacks mark enemies. Gaining 3 marks triggers additional damage and increases self damage.

name: Snowman Sortie
character_des: Targets hit by 4 Snowmen attacks will have one of their Dummies marked. When all Dummies are marked, the unit is frozen (dazed) and takes extra damage.
Everything about it is shrouded in mystery.

name: Drunk
character_des: This unit is drunk as a skunk...and totally smashed...

name: Highly Dangerous
character_des: Warning! Highly dangerous! Avoid! Avoid!

name: Training Use
character_des: For Training

name: Lethal
character_des: The target deals extremely high damage, don't get hit.

name: Automated defense installation
character_des: This structure can attack autonomously

name: Failed Isomer
character_des: Failed Isomer

name: Elite
character_des: A unit with outstanding abilities in its faction.

name: Griffin Elite
character_des: An elite unit from Griffin.

name: High-threat
character_des: This unit is extremely dangerous, please be careful!
